data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moriya, Mitsuyasu, Srinui, Khwanruan, Sawamoto, Shozo (2015): Two new species of the genus Anisomysis (Anisomysis) (Crustacea, Mysida, Mysidae) from coral reef waters in Thailand. ZooKeys 525: 129-145, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.525.5958, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.525.5958
